## RVLATOR
A RISC-V 64-bit Emulator in Rust

This is a evolving project for fun and no profit.
Currently this project is targeting as ISA emulator
starting with RV64 Base ISA. But more RISC-V extensions
ratified or in plan are not off the table.


### Input Assembly
```asm
_start:
    addi a0, zero, -4
    addi a1, zero, -5
    slti a2, a1, -4
    slli a2, a0, 63
    srli a3, a2, 1
    srai a4, a1, 1
    sltiu a5, a1, -4
    andi a6, a0, 4
    ori a7, a0, 4
    xori s2, a0, -1
    auipc s3, 0xdead
    lui s4, 0xdead
    addi a0, a0, -1
```

### Run
```bash
> cargo run -- test/bin/rvlatortest.bin
```

### Rvlator Output
